languages.text: Мантия из шкуры ксеноса, когда-то обхватывавшая плечи Леди Теодоры. Никто не вспомнил о ней спустя годы, как и о самой станции, где она была оставлена.
This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.
languages.original_text: Мантия из шкуры ксеноса, когда-то обхватывавшая плечи Леди Теодоры. Никто не вспомнил о ней спустя годы, как и о самой станции, где она была оставлена.

traits.locale_text: This xenos hide mantle once enrobed Lady Theodora's shoulders. No one remembered its existence or that of the station where it was left all these years ago.
This xenos hide mantle once enrobed Lady Theodora's shoulders. No one remembered its existence or that of the station where it was left all these years ago.
This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the many years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.
This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the many years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.
This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.
This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

languages.text: この異種族の皮で作られたマントは、かつてレディ・シオドーラの肩を飾っていたものだ。それ以来、流れる年月の中で、その存在も、それが残されたステーションのことも、すべての者が忘れてしまっていた。
languages.original_text: This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

traits.locale_text: この異種族の皮で作られたマントは、かつてレディ・シオドーラの肩を飾っていたものだ。それ以来、流れる年月の中で、その存在も、それが残されたステーションのことも、すべての者が忘れてしまっていた。

languages.text: Dieser Mantel aus Xenos-Haut zierte einst Lady Theodoras Schultern. In den Jahren seit ihrem Tod haben alle die Existenz des Mantels vergessen, und auch die der Station, auf der er sich befand.
languages.original_text: This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Mantel aus Xenos-Haut zierte einst Lady Theodoras Schultern. In den Jahren seit ihrem Tod haben alle die Existenz des Mantels vergessen, und auch die der Station, auf der er sich befand.

languages.text: Ce manteau en peau de xénos couvrait autrefois les épaules de dame Théodora. Il est ensuite tombé dans l'oubli, de même que la station où la libre-marchande l'avait laissé.
languages.original_text: This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

traits.locale_text: Ce manteau en peau de xénos couvrait autrefois les épaules de dame Théodora. Il est ensuite tombé dans l'oubli, de même que la station où la libre-marchande l'avait laissé.

languages.text: Este manto de piel de xenos adornó en el pasado los hombros de lady Theodora. En los años posteriores todos habían olvidado su existencia, así como la de la estación en la que fue abandonado.
languages.original_text: This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

traits.locale_text: Este manto de piel de xenos adornó en el pasado los hombros de lady Theodora. En los años posteriores todos habían olvidado su existencia, así como la de la estación en la que fue abandonado.

languages.text: 这件异形外皮斗篷曾戴在西奥多拉夫人的肩上。在那之后的岁月里，所有人都忘记了这件斗篷，也忘记了它被遗落的那座星站。
languages.original_text: This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

traits.locale_text: 这件异形外皮斗篷曾戴在西奥多拉夫人的肩上。在那之后的岁月里，所有人都忘记了这件斗篷，也忘记了它被遗落的那座星站。

languages.text: Bu zeno postu pelerin, bir zamanlar Leydi Theodora'nın omuzlarını süslüyordu. Yıllar içerisinde hem kendisi hem de bulunduğu istasyon unutulup gitti.
languages.original_text: This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

traits.locale_text: Bu zeno postu pelerin, bir zamanlar Leydi Theodora'nın omuzlarını süslüyordu. Yıllar içerisinde hem kendisi hem de bulunduğu istasyon unutulup gitti.
